title: there is no requirements listed when changing a name, but it asks you to look at requirements

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
all i see is "any offensive name will be altered" . i thought requirements would be stuff like 10 characters long, no spaces, special characters etc.

ddddddddd was just an example.

replies.body: A summoner name can have up to 16 characters, and the field box is allowing you to exceed that.  The legacy client may not be intuitive with your specific error, but you can use our[ summoner name](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814-Summoner-Name-FAQ) guide to cross reference.  Let me know if that clears things up!
